price: Ẹ fi èyí tó hàn nínú ẹ̀ṣẹ̀ àti èyí tó pamọ́ nínú rẹ̀ sílẹ̀. Dájúdájú àwọn tó ń ṣe iṣẹ́ ẹ̀ṣẹ̀, A óò san wọ́n ní ẹ̀san ohun tí wọ́n ń dá lẹ́ṣẹ̀.
arabic: وَذَرُواْ ظَٰهِرَ ٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَبَاطِنَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَكۡسِبُونَ ٱلۡإِثۡمَ سَيُجۡزَوۡنَ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَقۡتَرِفُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wadharū ẓāhira al-ith'mi wabāṭinahu inna alladhīna yaksibūna al-ith'ma sayuj'zawna bimā kānū yaqtarifūna
